ygData.subject: Re: Cepta
ygData.msgSnippet: He looks at the robot, then back at Dead-End, elbowing him. When we were heading to this planet, our great leader he hints with a tone of sarcasm, thought

He looks at the robot, then back at Dead-End, elbowing him. "When we 
were heading to this planet, our great leader" he hints with a tone of 
sarcasm, "thought we might not be successful, so we launched a few 
stasis pods with Decepticon warriors inside them. As long as there is 
one Decepticon, there is hope, or that is at least what Motormaster 
said. Do you recognize that pod now?" he asked, more telling him than 
asking.
